title: voice chat
body: Please, if you give us voice chat, at the very least make it easy to mute people like it is now.  Cyber bullying is rampant and really a part of my life that I have to deal with on a regular basis, so if you could just at least make it easy to mute and report, that's all I ask.

replies.body: if you complain about cyber bullying you are a moron that's just a fact if you get sad and start crying because of random symbols on a screen that you can understand you need to stop being on computers or phones and go play mario

You seem like the sort of trash that flames and bullies and then makes up nonsense like that to justify being trash.

In the end, semantics wont save you or change how other people see you. It must feel nice to know that.
I doubt league is going to get voice chat for exactly this reason, it never has yet. opt-in via third party VOIP seems to be working fine.
